April 5, 1963
Miss Lillian Brown, Director
Department of Radio-TV
George Washington University
2025 H Street, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Lillian:
Welcome to the NAEB PR Committee for 1963l
As our project for this year, NAEB Headquarters has requested
our committee to compile a SPEAKERS’ DIRECTORY, patterned after the
NAB and Audio-Visual directories. It will be our task to locate competent
speakers, who would be willing to talk on the merits of educational
broadcasting.
Would you please send me by April 20 your ideas concerning the best
method of procedure in compiling a speakers* directory for NAEB? Should
a questionnaire be sent to all members. If you believe a questionnaire
should be used would you please include with your reply a sample questionnaire,
including the information you feel is essential?
If you have an opportunity, look at the NAB and Audio-Visual Speakers*
Directories and express your views on which format you prefer. Add any
suggestions you might have for improving the formats in the Speakers'
Directory we preDare.
Shall we schedule a committee meeting at the Columbus Institute this
year? Will you be there? Let me know, please.
All the best.
